{{Use mdy dates|date=May 2017}} {{Infobox person | image = Timothy Simons 2014.jpg | caption = Simons at the New York PaleyFest 2014 for the TV show ''[[Veep]]'' | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1978|06|12}} | occupation = Actor, comedian | years_active = 2010–present | birth_place = [[Readfield, Maine]], U.S. | children = 2 | spouse = Annie Simons | residence = [[Los Angeles, California]], U.S. }} '''Timothy Simons''' (born June 12, 1978) is an American actor and comedian best known for his role as Jonah Ryan on the [[HBO]] [[television series]] ''[[Veep]]'',{{cite web |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2014/03/30/arts/television/timothy-simons-of-veep-on-hbo-is-going-places.html |title=Hail to the Mischief Maker |date=March 30, 2014 |work=The New York Times |accessdate=February 6, 2017}} for which he has received three nominations for the [[Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Comedy Series]].{{cite web |url=http://www.sagawards.org/awards/nominees-and-recipients/20th-annual-screen-actors-guild-awards |title=The 20th Annual Screen Actors Guild Awards |work=sagawards.org}}{{cite web |url=http://www.sagawards.org/awards/nominees-and-recipients/21st-annual-screen-actors-guild-awards |title=The 21st Annual Screen Actors Guild Awards |work=sagawards.org}} He has also had acting roles in the films ''[[The Interview]]'', ''[[Christine (2016 film)|Christine]]'', and ''[[The Boss (2016 film)|The Boss]]''. ==Personal life== He was born in [[Readfield, Maine]], the son of Susan and Ron Simons, and was raised in the state. Simons is married to Annie Simons and they have twins born in December 2011.{{cite web |url=http://bangordailynews.com/2012/05/21/living/maine-native-tim-simons-finds-success-on-hbo-comedy-series-veep/ |title=Maine native Tim Simons finds success on HBO comedy series ‘Veep’ |first1=Emily |last1=Burnham |publisher=Bangor Daily News |accessdate=February 6, 2017}} He currently resides in Los Angeles. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film |- ! Year ! Title ! Role ! class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 2010 | ''Days Together'' | Bartender at R Bar | |- | 2013 | ''[[Beneath the Harvest Sky]]'' | Dayton | |- | 2014 | ''[[Draft Day]]'' | Marx | |- | 2014 | ''[[Inherent Vice (film)|Inherent Vice]]'' | Agent Borderline | |- | 2014 | ''[[The Interview]]'' | Malcolm | |- | 2015 | ''[[Digging for Fire]]'' | Yoga Couple | |- | 2015 | ''[[Goosebumps (film)|Goosebumps]]'' | Officer Stevens | |- | 2016 | ''[[Christine (2016 film)|Christine]]'' | Steve Turner | |- | 2016 | ''[[The Boss (2016 film)|The Boss]]'' | Stephan | |- | 2016 | ''[[Flock of Dudes]]'' | Butler | |- | 2016 | ''[[Gold (2016 film)|Gold]]'' | Jeff Jackson | |- | 2018 | ''[[Irreplaceable You]]'' | Dominic | |- | 2018 | ''Extracurricular Activities'' | Cliff Dawkins | Post-production |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Television |- ! Year ! Title ! Role ! class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 2012–present | ''[[Veep]]'' | Jonah Ryan | 58 episodes
[[Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Comedy Series]] (2017)
Nominated – EWwy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in A Comedy Series{{cite web |author=EW Staff |title=2014 EWwy Awards: Comedy Nominees Are... |url=http://www.ew.com/ew/gallery/0,,20300978_20842000_30196599,00.html}}
Nominated – [[Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Comedy Series]] (2013–2016), |- | 2012 | ''[[Best Friends Forever (TV series)|Best Friends Forever]]'' | Tall Guy | Episode: "Single and Lovin' It" |- | 2015 | ''[[Stone Quackers]]'' | Various voices | 2 episodes |- | 2017 | ''[[Easy (TV series)|Easy]]'' | Whitman | Episode: "Package Thief" |- | 2018 | ''[[Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles]]'' | Huginn (voice) | Episode: "Mystic Mayhem" |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb name|3985937}} {{ScreenActorsGuildAwards EnsembleTVComedy 2010–2019}} {{Authority control}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Simons, Timothy}} [[Category:1978 births]] [[Category:21st-century American male actors]] [[Category:American male film actors]] [[Category:American male television actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Male actors from Maine]] [[Category:People from Readfield, Maine]]
